title: A New Plan at Work
description: Anna talks about a new project at work and her plans for next week.
speaker: Anna
text: Last week, my manager asked me to join a new project at work.
At first, I felt nervous because the project was difficult.
On Thursday, I had a long meeting with my team.
We discussed the problems and shared our ideas.
After the meeting, I felt more confident.
Next week, I am going to work more hours to finish my tasks.
I will also learn a new software to help me work faster.
I believe this project will help me improve my skills.

options: Because she didn’t like her manager
